question: You hit your ball, but after 3 minutes of searching, you can't find it. What do you do?*

choices.text: Keep looking until you find it. There's no time limit for searching
Go back to where you last played from, add one penalty stroke, and play another ball
Drop a new ball anywhere near the area where you think it got lost and play with a two-stroke penalty

explanation: If you cant find your ball after 3 minutes then it's lost (even if you then find it). You need to go back to where you last hit it and take that shot again and add a penalty shot to your score.
